title: Mojave National Preserve: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations               Multimedia Presentations            Mobile Map - available for Apple devices, a mobile map of Mojave National Preserve designed to help visitors nagivate through through the desert and bookmark their favorite spots.  Â       Mojave Desert Tortoise - available for Apple and Android devices, encourages users to take photos of desert tortoises they come across in the Mojave Desert in an effort to help researchers preserve this threatened species.
